title: Pixel 2 XL not charging while Switched ON/OFF
content:
My phone died because of low charge. Then I tried connecting to the charger, it didn't work for a while. 

Later it got charged. I switched it on, this time it stopped charging. 

After 2 days of looking into the solutions, I can only say none of the supporting materials worked so far. 
Currently, phone is not even charging while its Power OFF/ON. 
I have been using this device for more than a year now (Pixel 2 XL) 

Apart from this issue, the phone works totally fine.
